title: Drawing, "Design for Textile Border with Flowers and Deer"
inscribed: Inscribed on recto in brush and yellow and off-white gouache, upper left: B9 1873; on verso, upper right: #J 129
description: Border design on maroon background: medium size purple, lilac, red, and orange flowers with brown deer tipped diagonally in left corner.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Textile Border with Flowers and Deer".
Gouache on off-white paper. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-396.
